author: Ubisoft
description: The BMW Playlist arrives tomorrow in #TheCrewMotorfest
title: Step into the Bavarian legend 🚘✨

author: Ubisoft
description:
What makes a BMW a BMW? In this new Playlist, discover the DNA of an automotive legend and put your hands on prime examples of the brand’s heritage. Get ready to drive iconic and surprising BMW vehicles and to test your skills in new events every week!

Play the BMW Legacy Playlist starting January 7 in #TheCrewMotorfest.

The Crew Motorfest is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Ubisoft Connect PC, Epic Games Store, Luna and is included in the Ubisoft+ subscription. Get the game now on: https://ubi.li/1DX4P

Transfer hundreds of cars from The Crew 2 to The Crew Motorfest for FREE with the Collection Import. More info here: https://ubi.li/rHcEZ

About The Crew Motorfest:
Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate open-world driving experience. Explore an ever-expanding playground set in the Hawaiian archipelago, with new gameplay, features, cars and locations added in every update! Take the wheel of hundreds of iconic vehicles and immerse yourself in the best
title: The Crew Motorfest: BMW Legacy Playlist Trailer
